relevant_findings.rash: Diffuse scaly erythematous rash with serous drainage
relevant_findings.edema: Warm, nonpitting edema of the legs

relevant_findings.rash: Diffuse confluent erythroderma with superficial scaling and erosions, foci of lichenification, palmoplantar hyperkeratosis, and follicular prominence on the back.
relevant_findings.edema: Painful pitting edema of the legs
relevant_findings.other: Madarosis, bilateral small ectropion of the eyelids; remainder of the examination normal

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Erythroderma persisted, with some improvement after topical treatments.
